org.web3j.utils

Class Numeric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.web3j.utils.Numeric

  • public final class Numeric
extends java.lang.Object

    Message codec functions.

    Implementation as per https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/JSON-RPC#hex-value-encoding
